AVIOS_AND_MONEY_TEXT: Discover the destinations you can fly to with the Iberia Group and Vueling using your Avios (airport taxes not included). And if you don't have enough Avios or you don't want to use all of them, you can buy your tickets with the Avios&Money option on the next screen.
AVIOS_CALCULATOR_BODY_FAILURE_SYSTEM: At the moment it is not possible to subscribe to this alert.
AVIOS_CALCULATOR_BODY_FAILURE_TEMP: Sorry, an error occurred with your subscription to this notification. Please try again.
AVIOS_CALCULATOR_TITLE_ERROR: We can't find what you're looking for
